name: BEAR
description: BEAR is a memecoin about the famous XRPL meme "Bearableguy". It was one of the first memecoins on the XRPL. Recentently the memespace on the XRPL has gained alot of traction with the upcoming Dexscreener integration by First Ledger. BEAR is about building a strong community. We build funny GIFs and JPGs around bearableguy. We also build animated games with bearableguy as a main character. BEAR is now the top 2 memecoin on the XRPL.
